step.context: \textbf{Check Point } \#1: \text{ Is the function defined} \\ \text{and continuous in } [4, 5] ?
step.tex: \text{Yes. } e^x \text{ is defined and is continuous in } [4, 5]
\text{No. } e^x \text{ is not continuous at } x=4,5
step.reason:
e^x \text{ is defined and is continuous } \forall \, x \in \mathbb{R} \\
\text{Note :} \int^{b}_{a}f(x)\, dx \text{ makes sense only if f(x)} \\ \qquad \text{is defined and is continuous in [a, b].} \\ \text{ For example, }\int^{1}_{-1} \dfrac{1}{x} \, dx \text{ is not defined}\\ \text{because }\dfrac{1}{x} \text{ is discontinuos at } x = 0 \in [-1, 1]
